title: Ticket #4156: ALLOW_WRITE_COLLECTOR=*, fails in mixed mode IPv4/IPv6
description:
I don't believe this is in code that shipped.

On the master-ipv6-mixed-mode, if "ENABLE_IPV4=TRUE" and "ENABLE_IPV6=TRUE" and "ALLOW_COLLECTOR_WRITE=*," (the comma matters) everyone gets blocked.

Needs more investigation.
creator: adesmet
